Posts.Content: Jul 12, 2008 09:16PM jessicaC wrote: I'm here because my mother was diagnosed with Mestitastic Breast Caner in March. She's been in remission (suposedly) for probably 10 years. It came back and went straight to her bones. She is 53. She's got spots from her skull to her ankles. She's a strong woman, but the doctor wants her now to try Chemo and she's reluctant. I can understand why, due to what it did to her so long ago. She wants to try Spirulina and Chlorella. I'll support her with whatever she wants to do, but I was wondering if any one of you have tried this or know more about it than I do.
Posts.Title: Recurrence after 14 years sdoyle3 ozzie2
